Text: Earlier this year it signed up for a $6 billion credit facility. As part of the deal, We agreed to make the facility contingent on it raising $3 billion of equity. The debt deal is an all or nothing proposition: It only comes if We successfully raises $3 billion.
Cause: As part of the deal, We agreed to make the facility contingent on it raising $3 billion of equity.
Effect: Earlier this year it signed up for a $6 billion credit facility.
Sentence: <e2>Earlier this year it signed up for a $6 billion credit facility.</e2> <e1>As part of the deal, We agreed to make the facility contingent on it raising $3 billion of equity.</e1> The debt deal is an all or nothing proposition: It only comes if We successfully raises $3 billion.
